name: Ahmed Alia
bio: Researcher at Forschungszentrum Jülich, specializing in artificial intelligence for complex data analytics and modeling.

name: Thomas Chatagnon
bio: Researcher in crowd dynamics and pedestrian movement, specializing in balance recovery mechanisms in dense crowds and developing innovative data collection methodologies through his work with JupPedSim and PedPy.

name: Mohcine Chraibi
bio: Head of the division Pedestrian Dynamics - Modeling at the IAS-7. Research intrests include Modeling, Simulation, Wayfinding, Software Engineering, Validation, Verification

name: Alessandro Corbetta
bio: Assistant Professor at the Department of Applied Physics and Science Education at Eindhoven University of Technology, The Netherlands, leading the group AI for traffic and complex flows

affiliation.name: Department of Applied Physics and Science Education at Eindhoven University of Technology

name: Claudio Feliciani
bio: Project Associate Professor at Mathematical Physics of Emergent Systems. Interested in explaining the dynamics of complex systems by covering a wide range of fields and examining the problems under different perspectives.

affiliation.name: Research Center for Advanced Science and Technology (RCAST), University of Tokyo

name: Milad Haghani
bio: Senior Lecturer, UNSW Sydney. Expert in transport safety emphasizing human factors, with areas of interest including crowd safety, evacuation planning, transport psychology, econometric modelling, and meta-research.

affiliation.name: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

name: Mira Küpper
bio: Post-doctoral Researcher. Specializes in waiting pedestrians at train stations.

affiliation.name: Architecture and Civil Engineering, University of Wuppertal

name: Enrico Ronchi
bio: Associate Professor in Lund University. Specialist in Evacuation Modelling, Fire Safety Engineering, Human Behaviour in Fire, Pedestrian Modelling, Virtual Reality, WUI Emergencies, Road Safety and Tunnel Safety.

affiliation.name: Department of Building & Environmental Technology, LUND Unversity, Sweden

name: Jette Schumann
bio: Post-doctoral Researcher. Specializes in application-oriented pedestrian simulations, the interplay between pedestrian streams and urban traffic, crowd movement analysis, and research software development.

name: Antoine Tordeux
bio: Jun.- Prof. Dr. Antoine Tordeux on the complex system of road traffic. Specializes in Applied Mathematics, Traffic Flow, Self-driven particle systems, and Pedestrian Dynamics.

affiliation.name: Traffic Safety and Reliability, University of Wuppertal

name: Ezel Üsten
bio: PhD researcher in the division of Pedestrian Dynamics - Social Psychology at IAS-7, specializing in motivation, emotion, and behavior in crowd entrance scenarios.
